Package edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Actor, HPEntity
    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityInterface
    Base class for simulated items and actors. Entity implements the EntityInterface.

      • tick

        public <L extends Location> void tick​(L loc)
        Description copied from interface: EntityInterface
        By default, Entities do nothing on a tick. Override this method if you want an Entity to respond to the passage of time, e.g. by displaying a message or changing state.
        Specified by:
        tick in interface EntityInterface
        Parameters:
        loc - the Location of the Entity

      • say

        public void say​(java.lang.String message)
        Description copied from interface: EntityInterface
        Output a message to the Entity's MessageRenderer.

        This message would be displayed on the View (an implementation of GridRenderer)

        Specified by:
        say in interface EntityInterface
        Parameters:
        message - the String to display
        See Also:

        public void removeAffordance​(Affordance a)
        Description copied from interface: EntityInterface
        Remove an Affordance from the set of Affordances this Entity manifests

        This method does nothing if the Entity doesn't manifest the Affordance a

        Specified by:
